name: Make a chord progression (Ambient)
description: Create an atmospheric ambient chord progression with lush pads and evolving textures
hints: Ambient chord progressions typically move slowly (72 BPM or slower)
Use sustained chords with long attack and release times
Try modal progressions: stay in one key and explore nearby chords
Common ambient progressions: I-IV-vi-V or vi-IV-I-V in major keys
Add extensions like 7ths, 9ths, or sus chords for rich harmony
Let chords overlap and breathe - space is part of the sound
The reverb and chorus will add depth and movement to static chords

validationSteps.description: Create at least 3 chord events with different pitches
Use at least 3 different pitch classes (varied harmony)
Play the progression and verify the ambient feel
